definition: The process of becoming outdated or no longer useful.
A statement that contradicts itself but might still be true.
In a state of inactivity or dormancy.
Tending to induce drowsiness or sleep.
Reserved or uncommunicative in speech; saying little.
Excessively flattering or oily in manner.
Pale and giving the impression of illness.
An uneducated or unsophisticated person from the countryside.
